code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var usersSelector=function usersSelector(state){return state.users;};export var getIsSignedIn=createSelector([usersSelector],function(state){return state.isSignedIn;});export var getProductsInCart=createSelector([usersSelector],function(state){return state.cart;});export var getOrderHistory=createSelector([usersSelector],function(state){return state.orders;});export var getUserId=createSelector([usersSelector],function(state){return state.uid;});export var getUsername=createSelector([usersSelector],function(state){return state.username;});
